items.quip: An original GB! Who has 4 AAs these days, anyway?
A 380Z! So that's what happens what a laptop lets itself go.
A GBA! Look at all the great graphics you can't make out!
A GB Light! That backlight was totally worth Â£200... right?
A T420! You're pretty sure the trackpad is made out of sandpaper.
A Razr! You wouldn't wish this numpad on your worst enemy.
